data.prayer: Father, encourage the 2,380 believers in Saint Patrick to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Patrick, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Saint Patrick, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,380 believers find a person of peace today among the 3,420 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Saint Patrick, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Barrouallie
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Barrouallie, Saint Patrick, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Saint Patrick, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Saint Patrick that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.focus_label: Saint Patrick, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Saint Patrick who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

location.name: Saint Patrick
location.full_name: Saint Patrick, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
